## PageInfo interface

A wrapper around the [TabInfo](./tab-info.tabinfo.md) object that allows us to capture an enabled/disabled state

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface PageInfo 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [enabled](./tab-info.pageinfo.enabled.md) | boolean | Whether the extension should be enabled at all for the current tab |
|  [tabInfo](./tab-info.pageinfo.tabinfo.md) | [TabInfo](./tab-info.tabinfo.md) | Information about the tab's current contents |
